mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Lowery, David
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Gallia Co., Ohio [Gallia County, Ohio]Gallia Co., Ohio [Gallia County, Ohio]
Kingsville, Gallia Co., Ohio [Kingsville, Gallia County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Lowery, David Patient Age: 33. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of right leg. Conical bullet which entered external aspect of leg passing through gastrocnemi muscles to exist out the union of upper and middle third of tibia and fibula. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Furlough 1865/12/13. Recovery and returned to duty .
